videos.title: Truckee Dirt Fondo 2019
videos.description:
This video is about 2019 Truckee Dirt Fondo

Music by, The High Violets, Julia and Fatlip, Today's Your Day, as always if you dig it BUY IT!

videos.title: SaganFondo '18
videos.description: Inagural SaganFondo in Truckee. Brutal and dirty course, but oh so fun!

videos.title: Truckee Dirt Fondo 2021
videos.description: This is the diy Version as Bike Monkey has passed on (year two) due to Corona. See you all in 2022

videos.title: 2019 Truckee Gran Fondo Hairpins  #3
videos.description: 06/08/2019  short distance about 26 miles but it was fun.

videos.title: Peter Sagan Gravel Fondo . VLOG 2.183
videos.description:
The Peter Sagan Gravel Fondo. 68mi - 4800 Vert! Fantastic Roads and Great Peeps!

Follow on Instagram
Cody Kaiser :: http://instagram.com/thekidkaiser
LangeTwins :: http://instagram.com/langetwins
Kinetic Cycles :: http://instagram.com/kinetic_cycles

Website :: http://codykaiser.com

Music by Epidemic Sound :: https://epidemicsound.com
